timeline.body: Use `List.of(...)` and not `Collections.singletonList(...)`. I know you just copied the code, so maybe update the existing code as well. This is an old code smell, but to make OTP a better place we try to improve a little for every PR.

timeline.body: This error is because the `request.dateTime` is outside the service period, so we should return a constant(enum) for that even if it is just one possibility. Add `DATE_TIME` to `InputField` and call the constructor of `RoutingError` with that.
